all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
I am the first and the last; I am he who liveth, I am he who was slain; I am your advocate with the Father.
Doctrine and Covenants 110:4
Quote of the Day
"Jesus Christ understands and is always eager to share our burdens."
Elder Sergio R. Vargas | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
